items.caption: non-zero pixels: at least one of channels ≠0
NaN: at least one of channels is not-a-number (float/double types only)
∞: at least one of channels is an infinity (float/double types only)
equal to raw custom value: all channels =(specified value)
nonequal to raw custom value: at least on of channel ≠(specified value)
equal to normalized (0..1) custom value: all channels =(specified value)
nonequal to normalized (0..1) custom value: at least on of channel ≠(specified value)

controls.caption: Check maximally first 3 channels (usually RGB); if false, all channels (like 4th Alpha) will be checked
controls.name: checkOnlyRGBChannels

controls.caption: Custom value (for last two search options)
controls.name: customValue

controls.caption: Dilation size
controls.description: If dilation size > 0, the result will be automatically dilated by circle with this diameter (to emphasize possible very little areas).
controls.name: dilationSize
